Felicio /fe-li-cio/ [4 sylls.] as a boys' name is of Latin derivation, and the name Felicio means happy, lucky. Felicio is a variant transcription of Felix (Latin): masculine of Felicity. Compare surname Felicia. Kreatif forms: Fenlicio, Flecio, Flelicio. Felicio is an unusual given name for males but a somewhat prominent surname for all people (#81414 out of 150436, Top 54%). (2000 U.S. Census). Felix (#267 the previous year) is the only prominent variation form of Felicio (outside Top 1000) .

[ syll. fe-li-cio, fel-ic-io ] The baby boy name Felicio is pronounced as FAHL IH Siyow †. The origin of Felicio is Latin. Felicio is a variant transcription of Felix. Felicio is unusual as a baby boy name. It is not listed in the top 1000. Out of the family of boy names directly linked to Felicio, Felix was the most widely used in 2012.
